page.title: 12HOUSEHOLD AMENITIES
page.content:
{ Household Amenities
All the houses in our area have running hot and cold water,have an inside toilet and a fixed bath.
{LEISURE
In our area there is a variety of leisure amenities,including playing fields,public houses,scout and brouny groups,churches and social clubs but there are many things missing.It is {2.5}miles the nearest public swimming pool and the same for indoor bowling.The nearest ice skating rink is{8}miles away,and we are quite lucky having one this close.Of the people we interviewed{50%}thought leisure amenities were inadequate.
